a.n: The Who: Live at the Isle Of Wight Festival

p.d: In 1970, 600,000 people came to the Isle of Wight to attend a music festival. At 2 a.m. August 30th, The Who appeared and gave one of the most memorable performances of their career. 'I Can't Explain', 'Magic Bus', 'My Generation' and many more classic hits.
